channel.title: BBC World News
channel.description: Feed from BBC World News - with images and summaries

item.title: Zelensky tells BBC Putin has started WW3 and must be stopped
item.description:
Ukraine's president sat down with the BBC's Jeremy Bowen in Kyiv days before the four-year anniversary of the war.

item.title: Mexico's most wanted drug lord 'El Mencho' killed in military operation
item.description:
Nemesio Oseguera Cervantes, known as "El Mencho", headed one of Mexico's most powerful drug cartels.

item.title: Armed man killed after entering secure perimeter of Trump's residence, Secret Service says
item.description:
The suspect was carrying a shotgun and fuel can when he was killed, officers said. Trump was in Washington DC at the time.

item.description:

item.title: Bones of St Francis of Assisi go on public display in Italy
item.description:
The remains of Italy's patron saint have only been seen in public once before - for one day in 1978.
